<main>
    
    <section class="hero">
        <div class="maincolumn">

            <article class="row">
                <h1>Easy for editors, and a developer's dream CMS</h1>
                <h2 class="subheader articlebody">Bolt is an open source Content Management Tool, which strives to be as simple and straightforward as possible. It is quick to set up, easy to configure, uses elegant templates, and above all: Its a joy to use.</h2>
            </article>

        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="shorttexts">
        <article>
            <i class="fa fa-cogs fa-2x"></i>
            <h3>Open source</h3>
        </article>
        <article>
            <i class="fa fa-mobile fa-2x"></i>
            <h3>Responsive</h3>
        </article>
        <article>
            <i class="fa fa-group fa-2x"></i>
            <h3>Community-driven</h3>
        </article>
        <article>
            <i class="fa fa-magic fa-2x"></i>
            <h3>Easy to use</h3>
        </article>
    </section>

    <section class="maininfo">

                        
        
                    <article class="column">
                <h2>Developers</h2>
                <h3 class="subheader">Quick to set up and easily extendible</h3>
                <p>Create all you need. The custom types and fields in the flexible ContentType structure give you all freedom to make your site just as you need it.</p><p>Built upon Silex with Symfony components, Bolt is free and open source.</p>
                <!-- a href="#" class="button">Learn more</a -->
            </article>
                    <article class="column">
                <h2>Frontend designers</h2>
                <h3 class="subheader">Your design, your code.</h3>
                <p>Like to write clean markup and create your own templates?</p><p>Bolt uses Twig for its templates, an elegant, flexible and concise templating language, that allows you to write templates the way you want.</p>
                <!-- a href="#" class="button">Read more</a -->
            </article>
                    <article class="column">
                <h2>Content editors</h2>
                <h3 class="subheader">Easy and powerful editing</h3>
                <p>The fully responsive dashboard works on desktop computers, laptops, tablets and mobile phones alike, so you can control anything from wherever you are.</p><p>You work with a team of editors? Bolt comes with a fully customizable structure for user levels.</p>
                <!-- a href="/page/features" class="button">More features</a -->
            </article>
        
    </section>

    <section class="features">
        <div class="maincolumn">
            <h1>Features that make Bolt an awesome CMS</h1>
                                    <ul class="featurelist">
                
                                    <li>
                                                    <div class="imgcontainer"><img src="/thumbs/606x400r/2014-12/featureimg_twig.png" alt="Twig templates" width="303" class="feature-img-1" /></div>
                                                <h3><i class="fa fa-bolt"></i>Twig templates</h3>
                        <p>Bolt uses <a href="http://twig.sensiolabs.org">Twig</a> for its templates. A very elegant, flexible and concise templating language, that allows you to write templates the way you want. You don't have to know PHP or know how databases work in order to get whatever content you need from the backend.</p>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                                                    <div class="imgcontainer"><img src="/thumbs/606x400r/2016-05/featureimg-responsive.png" alt="Responsive / Mobile" width="303" class="feature-img-2" /></div>
                                                <h3><i class="fa fa-bolt"></i>Responsive / Mobile</h3>
                        <p>Bolt's backend interface is fully responsive, so it works on desktop computers, laptops, tablets and phones alike. Very convenient, either on the road or on the couch.</p>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                                                    <div class="imgcontainer"><img src="/thumbs/606x400r/2014-12/featureimg_contenttypes.png" alt="Powerful ContentTypes" width="303" class="feature-img-3" /></div>
                                                <h3><i class="fa fa-bolt"></i>Powerful ContentTypes</h3>
                        <p>The flexible ContentTypes allow you to use all kinds of different fields to create different types of content: pages, blog entries, events, book reviews, or whatever you can think of  all in a editable YML files.</p>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                                                <h3><i class="fa fa-bolt"></i>Free!</h3>
                        <p>Bolt is completely free to use for both personal as well as commercial websites. And we're not going to charge you for "premium" features either. Nope, completely free. And did we mention that Bolt is Open Source as well?</p>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                                                <h3><i class="fa fa-bolt"></i>PHP 5.5.9 and higher</h3>
                        <p>Bolt requires PHP 5.5.9, and is fully PHP 7 compatible. It requires ;only some very common modules to be installed. It runs on different types of database engines, and it can be installed on basically any web server.</p>

                    </li>
                                    <li>
                                                <h3><i class="fa fa-bolt"></i>All code on GitHub</h3>
                        <p>All our code is hosted on GitHub and we use GitHub's issues as our&nbsp;tracker for bugs and issues. Bolt is licensed under the MIT license and developers are encouraged to use the version from GitHub, and we welcome code contributions.</p>
                    </li>
                            </ul>
            <a href="/pages/features" class="button">Explore the features</a>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="slider">
        <div class="inner">
                        <div class='pager'></div>             <div class="bolt-slideshow" data-cycle-swipe='true' data-cycle-fx='scrollHorz' data-cycle-timeout='0' data-cycle-pager=".pager" data-cycle-slides="> div" data-cycle-log="false">
                                    <div class="slide" data-cycle-pager-template="<a href=#>Responsive</a> ">
                        <div class="slideimg">
                            <img class="large" src="/thumbs/700x430c/2016-05/bolt3-slide-responsive.png"> <img class="mobile" width="260" src="/thumbs/520x400c/2016-05/bolt3-slidesmall-responsive.png">
                        </div>
                        <div class="highlights">
                            <ul><li>Quickly edit on desktop, tablet or mobile</li><li>Upload photos from your device's camera</li><li>Perfectly designed to build your own responsive websites</li></ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="slide" data-cycle-pager-template="<a href=#>Content editor</a> ">
                        <div class="slideimg">
                            <img class="large" src="/thumbs/700x430c/2016-05/bolt3-slide-content-editor.png"> <img class="mobile" width="260" src="/thumbs/520x400c/2016-05/bolt3-slidesmall-content-editor.png">
                        </div>
                        <div class="highlights">
                            <ul><li>Clear user interface</li><li>Insert images easily with the Stack</li><li>Preview your work quickly</li><li>Save your work as a draft, publish at a future date or immediately</li></ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="slide" data-cycle-pager-template="<a href=#>The Stack</a> ">
                        <div class="slideimg">
                            <img class="large" src="/thumbs/700x430c/2016-05/bolt3-slide-stack.png"> <img class="mobile" width="260" src="/thumbs/520x400c/2016-05/bolt3-slidesmall-stack.png">
                        </div>
                        <div class="highlights">
                            <ul><li>Easy acces to your latest images</li><li>Quickly move files around between ContentTypes</li><li>Upload everywhere</li><li>Thumbnail view for quick selecting</li></ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="slide" data-cycle-pager-template="<a href=#>ContentTypes</a> ">
                        <div class="slideimg">
                            <img class="large" src="/thumbs/700x430c/2016-05/bolt3-slide-contenttypes.png"> <img class="mobile" width="260" src="/thumbs/520x400c/2016-05/bolt3-slidesmall-contenttypes.png">
                        </div>
                        <div class="highlights">
                            <ul><li>Add custom field types</li><li>Organize in custom tags</li><li>Structure your content as you wish</li><li>Many field types to choose from</li><li>As many different ContentTypes as you want</li><li>HTML, Markdown, checkboxes, galleries, image uploads, geolocation etc.</li></ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="slide" data-cycle-pager-template="<a href=#>Twig Templates</a> ">
                        <div class="slideimg">
                            <img class="large" src="/thumbs/700x430c/2014-11/slide_lg_twig.png"> <img class="mobile" width="260" src="/thumbs/520x400c/2014-11/slide_sm_twig.png">
                        </div>
                        <div class="highlights">
                            <ul><li>The powerful Twig template engine</li><li>Elegant and easy syntax</li><li>Frontenders love it</li><li>Quick and secure, no PHP code in your templates</li></ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="slide" data-cycle-pager-template="<a href=#>Relations & Taxonomies</a> ">
                        <div class="slideimg">
                            <img class="large" src="/thumbs/700x430c/2016-05/bolt3-slide-taxonomies.png"> <img class="mobile" width="260" src="/thumbs/520x400c/2016-05/bolt3-slidesmall-taxonomies.png">
                        </div>
                        <div class="highlights">
                            <ul><li>Create relationships between all your ContentTypes</li><li>Add categories, tags, and other taxonomies</li><li>Add as many taxonomies as you like</li><li>Name your taxonomies to stay organized</li></ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <section class="secinfo">
                        
        
                    <article class="column">
                <h2>Community</h2>
                <h3 class="subheader">Supported by a growing community</h3>
                <p>You don't want to be stuck while building your site. That's why we have an <a href="/page/community">extensive community</a> with a lot of ways to get in touch and to help you out.&nbsp;</p><p>We are active on several different locations on the internet like IRC (#boltcms on Freenode), <a href="http://twitter.com/boltcm">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://github.com/bolt/bolt">GitHub</a>.</p><p>Or you can just pick a <a href="https://market.bolt.cm/browse?q=theme">theme</a> from the <a href="https://market.bolt.cm">market.bolt.cm</a> website and whip up a new website in a couple of minutes.</p>
                <a href="page/community" class="button">Visit the community page</a>
            </article>
                    <article class="column">
                <h2>Documentation</h2>
                <h3 class="subheader">Extensive info for editors and developers</h3>
                <p>In the <a href="http://docs.bolt.cm">Bolt documentation</a> developers and implementors will find answers to most of their questions.</p><p>For frontend developers there is a <a href="http://cheatsheet.bolt.cm/">handy cheatsheet</a> available with a lot of common snippets to get you up to speed.</p><p>And for editors we have a decent manual that explains working in the Dashboard and with CKeditor.</p>
                <a href="http://docs.bolt.cm" class="button">Go to docs.bolt.cm</a>
            </article>
                    <article class="column">
                <h2>Contribute</h2>
                <h3 class="subheader">Work with us</h3>
                <p>Bolt is built and supported by over hundreds of international developers. Started in 2012 as an open source project, it has currently over 20,000 commits on GitHub.</p>

<p><a href="https://github.com/bolt/bolt">Fork Bolt</a> if you want to contribute, or get in touch.</p>

<p>Also, check out the <a href="https://market.bolt.cm">extensions website</a> where you can find a lot of themes and extensions. You can contribute by adding your own cool theme for instance!</p>
                <a href="https://github.com/bolt/bolt" class="button">View Bolt on GitHub</a>
            </article>
            </section>

//<![CDATA[
var theForm = document.forms['aspnetForm'];
if (!theForm) {
    theForm = document.aspnetForm;
}
function __doPostBack(eventTarget, eventArgument) {
    if (!theForm.onsubmit || (theForm.onsubmit() != false)) {
        theForm.__EVENTTARGET.value = eventTarget;
        theForm.__EVENTARGUMENT.value = eventArgument;

<script type="text/javascript">


    function fechardhtml() {
        if (navigator.appName == 'Netscape' && document.layers != null) {
            document.layers['Lbanner'].visibility = "hide";
        } else if (document.all != null) {
            document.all['Lbanner'].style.visibility = "hidden";
        }
        document.getElementById('Lbanner').style.visibility = "hidden";
   }

</script>

                <li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.petrobras.com/pt/quem-somos/presenca-global/">Presen&#231;a global</a></li>
                <li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.petrobras.com.br/pt/outros-sites-petrobras/">Outros sites Petrobras</a></li>
            </ul>
        </nav>
        <!-- nav.outros-links -->

    </div>
    <!-- wrap -->

</footer>


        <!-- Início Modal -->

    <!-- Início Login -->
    <div id="login" class="window">
        <div class="wrapModal">
            <!-- Botão para fechar a janela tem class="close" -->
            <a href="#" class="close">&#215;</a>
            <h1>Acesso ao Conte&#250;do</h1>
            <p>Exclusivo para jornalistas cadastrados.</p>
            <p class="aviso"></p>

                </div>

                </div>

                    </p>

            $("section.destaques article, section.ultimas-fotos article a").fadeIn();
            $("section.destaques").css("background", "none");

                            <div class="theme" data-magellan-destination="sablonierflexcards">
                    <h3>
                        flexcards 
                        <button class="right tiny theme-select" data-theme="sablonier/flexcards">SELECT THEME</button>
                    </h3>
                    <a name="sablonierflexcards"></a>
                                            <h6>by: Yves Sablonier</h6>
                                                                <p>Flexcards is a bolt theme built with bootstrap 4 (alpha 6), therefore, and other reason,  it is still experimental. It makes use of bootstrap &#039;cards&#039; in a &#039;fluid container&#039;. It is ordering the cards (or blocks) in reading direction also for desktop and tablet. But the most important point might be building the bolt menu and other parts with bootstrap css/js and use it as replacement for foundation css and js entirely (compared to the shipped base theme).

Demo: choose &#039;flexcards&#039; on http://try.bolt.cm

**Please file issues and enhancements requests to http://www.github.com/sablonier/flexcards**</p>
                                        <ul class="screenshots" data-orbit> 
                                                     
                                <li><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sablonier/flexcards/master/screenshots/flexcards_teaser.png"></li>

                        Slanted 
                        <button class="right tiny theme-select" data-theme="sahassar/slanted">SELECT THEME</button>
                    </h3>
                    <a name="sahassarslanted"></a>
                                            <h6>by: Svante Richter</h6>
                                                                <p>This is the &quot;Slanted&quot; theme for bolt, built upon a variation of the same flex grid that Base-2016 is built upon. It is very minimalistic, and only supplies three main twig files by default.

By default it only has  6.9 kB CSS and 1.7 kB JS, so it should be very performant.</p>

It is very minimalistic, and only supplies three main twig files by default. By default it only has 6.5 kB CSS and 0.5 kB JS, so it should be very performant.</p>

                            <div class="theme" data-magellan-destination="boltfoundation">
                    <h3>
                        Basic template for a new Bolt theme based on Zurb Foundation for Sites 6.3 project. 
                        <button class="right tiny theme-select" data-theme="bolt/foundation">SELECT THEME</button>
                    </h3>
                    <a name="boltfoundation"></a>
                                            <h6>by: Bob den Otter</h6>
                                                                <p>Foundation for Bolt is a blank theme for Bolt, built on top of
Zurb Foundation for sites 6. 

Foundation for Bolt comes with all of the great features that are found in the
Zurb Foundation framework, and a few things more. Simply put, if it works in
Foundation, it will work in Foundation for Bolt. 

You can use whatever you want  seriously. You can use Gulp, the
Foundation CLI-tool, Codekit or nothing at all. Its completely up to
you how you decide to build your theme  Foundation for Bolt will stay
out of your workflow as much as possible.</p>
                                        <ul class="screenshots" data-orbit> 
                                                     
                                <li><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobdenotter/bolt-foundation-theme/master/screenshots/frontpage.png"></li>
                                                                                 
                                <li><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bobdenotter/bolt-foundation-theme/master/screenshots/page.png"></li>
                                                                                                </ul>

                                                    <li data-magellan-arrival="cal7barebones-bootstrap4">
                                <a class="" href="#cal7barebones-bootstrap4">Barebones Bootstrap4</a>
                            </li> 
                                            </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div> 
        </div>
    </div>

        <h1>
        
                
        <span>Getting Started » </span>
        Introduction
</h1>

                

        
<p>This is the Bolt Documentation. There are a lot of docs for Bolt, so it is split
up in a few sections. If you're getting started with Bolt or looking for
installation instructions, start with the first part. The second part of the
docs is about working <em>in</em> Bolt. Setting up ContentTypes, taxonomies, etc. The
third part is a reference for all things related to building your templates and
themes for Bolt. If you're just beginning with Bolt, don't forget to check out
our excellent Bolt Theming Tutorial as well.</p>
<p><a href="about" class="button large expand docsintro">
Getting Started<br>
<small>About Bolt, System Requirements, Installation and Upgrading.</small>
</a></p>
<p><a href="../cheatsheet" class="button large expand docsintro">
The Bolt cheatsheet<br>
<small>A great little reference for all things Bolt</small>
</a></p>
<p><a href="../contenttypes" class="button large expand docsintro">
ContentTypes<br>
<small>ContentTypes, records, fields, taxonomies, relationships, etc</small>
</a></p>
<p><a href="../templating/templates-routes" class="button large expand docsintro">
Templating / Theming<br>
<small>Writing templates, Twig, fetching content, paging, search</small>
</a></p>
<div class="docsintro">
    <!-- <a href="#" onclick="alert('Coming soon!');" class="button medium docsintro">
    Templating tutorial (soon!)<br>
    <small>Building a theme, step by step</small>
    </a> -->
    <a href="../internals" class="button medium docsintro">
    Bolt Internals<br><small>Contributing, coding standards</small>
    </a>
    <a href="../other/manifesto" class="button medium docsintro">
    Our manifesto<br><small>Keeping the community healthy!</small>
    </a>
    <a href="../howto" class="button medium docsintro">
    Other information<br><small>HOWTO's, Nut, and credits</small>
    </a>
</div>
<p><a href="../extensions/introduction" class="button large expand docsintro">
Extending Bolt<br>
<small>Writing extensions, submitting them to the marketplace</small>
</a></p>

        

        <div class="row" style="max-width: 680px;">
            <div class="large-6 columns">
                            </div>
            <div class="large-6 columns text-right">
                                                        <a class="button middle" href="/3.2/getting-started/about">
                        Next: <span>About Bolt</span> &raquo;
                    </a>
                            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="community-notice show-for-large">
            <hr>
            Couldn't find what you were looking for? We are happy to help you in the
            <a href="https://discuss.bolt.cm/" target="_blank">forum</a>, on
            <a href="http://slack.bolt.cm/" target="_blank">Slack</a> or on
            <a href="http://bolt.cm/irc" target="_blank">IRC</a>.<br>
            Spotted a typo, or have something to add?
            <a href="https://github.com/bolt/docs/blob/release/3.2/docs/getting-started/introduction.md" target="_blank">Edit this page on GitHub</a>.
        </div>

    <div class="artigos">
                    
                        <article class="artigo">
                            <h5>Fuja das d&#237;vidas</h5>
                            <div>
                                O Conta Comigo elaborou oito dicas simples para voc&ecirc; colocar em pr&aacute;tica hoje mesmo
                            </div>
                            <a href="https://contacomigo.spprevcom.com.br/Financas/ComoEvitar">
                                <span class="icon-right-open-mini cor-2"></span>
                                <span class="cor-4">Leia mais</span>
                            </a>
                        </article>
                    
                    
                        <article class="artigo">
                            <h5>Gloss&#225;rio</h5>
                            <div>
                                Sabe o que &eacute; fator previdenci&aacute;rio? Aprenda estes e outros termos relacionados ao mundo financeiro
                            </div>
                            <a href="https://contacomigo.spprevcom.com.br/Duvidas/Glossario">
                                <span class="icon-right-open-mini cor-2"></span>

                            </a>
                        </article>
                    
                    
                        <article class="artigo">
                            <h5>Planeje-se em 5 passos</h5>
                            <div>
                                O planejamento das finan&ccedil;as &eacute; fundamental para garantir seguran&ccedil;a, estabilidade e um futuro tranquilo para sua fam&iacute;lia
                            </div>
                            <a href="https://contacomigo.spprevcom.com.br/P/Financas/">
                                <span class="icon-right-open-mini cor-2"></span>
                                <span class="cor-4">Leia mais</span>
                            </a>
                        </article>
                    
                    
                        <article class="artigo">
                            <h5>Fa&#231;a o teste</h5>
                            <div>
                                Posso ter um plano de previd&ecirc;ncia complementar da SP-PREVCOM?
                            </div>
                            <a href="https://contacomigo.spprevcom.com.br/QuestionarioInternet?id=1">
                                <span class="icon-right-open-mini cor-2"></span>
                                <span class="cor-4">Leia mais</span>
                            </a>
                        </article>
                    


    </div>
</div>
<div id="perguntaUsuario" style="display:none;">
    <div class="bloco">
        <h3>Faça sua pergunta</h3>
        <div class="bloco-conteudo">
<form action="/PerguntaUsuarioInternet/GravarJson" id="formPerguntaUsuario" method="post" onsubmit="return false;">                <div class="form-bloco">
                    <div class="bloco-duplo medade">
                        <div class="bloco">
                            <label for="nome">Nome</label>
                            <input class="fundo-2 radius" id="nome" name="nome" type="text" value="" />
                        </div>
                        <div class="bloco">
                            <label for="email">Email</label>
                            <input class="fundo-2 radius" id="email" name="email" type="text" value="" />
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="form-bloco" style="margin:10px 0;">
                    <label for="pergunta">Pergunta</label>
                    <textarea class="fundo-2 radius" cols="20" id="pergunta" name="pergunta" rows="2" style="width:100%;">
</textarea>
                </div>
                <div class="form-bloco form-acoes">
                    <button type="submit" class="h4">Enviar</button>
                </div>
</form>        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<script>
    $(document).on("click", "#facaSuaPergunta", function() {
        abrirModal($("#perguntaUsuario").html(), 480, 320);
    });
    $(document).on('submit', '#formPerguntaUsuario', enviarPergunta);

    function enviarPergunta() {
        var dados = $(this).serialize();
        if (dados.indexOf("=&") > 0) {
            mostrarAviso("Preencha todos os campos!");
        } else {
            mostrarAguarde();
            $.ajax({
                url: this.action,
                type: this.method,
                data: $(this).serialize(),
                success: function(data) {
                    if (data == false)
                        mostrarAviso("Falha ao enviar, tente mais tarde");
                    else {
                        fecharModal();
                        mostrarAviso("Pergunta enviada com sucesso!");
                    }
                },
                error: function(jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                    mostrarAviso(textStatus + errorThrown);
                }
            }).always(function() { mostrarAguarde(); });
        }
    }
    </script>
</section>

        <li><a id='menuParticipante00001' class='h4'>A SP-PREVCOM</a><div class='menuInterno menuInterno-grande fundoTransparente-1 ' ><div class='menuInterno-coluna'><ul><li class='menuTitulo <script>
    function mostrarAviso(titulo, tipo, executar, descricao) {
        if (!$('#aviso').is(':visible')) {
            if (titulo)
                $("#avisoTitulo").html(titulo);
            if (descricao)
                $("#avisoDesc").html(descricao);
            if (tipo) {
                $('#avisoExecutar').attr('title', tipo);
            }
            if (tipo == 2 || tipo == 3) {
                if (executar) {
                    $('#avisoExecutar').val(executar);
                }
            }
            $("#aviso").fadeIn();
            alinharAlerta('#aviso');
        } else {
            $("#aviso").fadeOut(300, function() {
                $(".aviso-mensagem").css("width", "335px");
                $("#avisoDesc").html("");
            });
        }
    }
</script></div>
</section>

        <div class="rodape-itens">
            <div class="endereco">
                <h2>SP-PREVCOM</h2>
                <p>Fundação de Previdência Complementar do Estado de São Paulo</p>
                <div class="end-info">
                            <p>Avenida Brigadeiro Lu&#237;s Ant&#244;nio, 2701 Jardim Paulista</p>
                            <p>S&#227;o Paulo - SP</p>
                            <p>01401-000</p>
                    <a class="end-link cor-4" href="https://goo.gl/maps/FoUsj" target="_blank"><span class="icon-right-open-mini"></span>Ir para mapa</a>
                </div>
                <img class="end-mapa" src="/Content/Site/img/mapa.jpg" alt="Mapa" width="290" height="169">
            </div>

        <div class="utility-tray-container">
            <div class="utility-tray">
                <div id="site-search" class="utility-link site-search">
                    <div class="content">
                        <form class="ng-pristine ng-valid topSearchForm" id="topSearchForm" name="topSearchForm" action="/search/browse/search/" method="get" enctype="application/x-www-form-urlencoded">
                            <div class="input-group">

                                <input class="form-control searchField" id="topSearchInput" name="keyword" value="" placeholder="Enter Your Search Term" type="text">

                                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Search</button>
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </form>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div id="account-info" class="utility-link account-info">
                    <div class="content">

                        <!-- Account Unauthenticated -->
                        <div id="accountLinksLoggedOut" class="unauthenticated">
                            <h2 class="utility-header">Log in to Your Red Hat Account</h2>
                            <div class="row col-border-row">
                                <div class="col-sm-6 col-border">
                                    <p><a href="https://access.redhat.com/login" id="accountLogin" class="btn btn-primary">Log In</a></p>
                                    <p>Your Red Hat account gives you access to your profile, preferences, and services, depending on your status.</p>
                                </div>
                                <div class="col-sm-6 col-border col-border-left">
                                    <p><a href="https://www.redhat.com/wapps/ugc/register.html" class="btn btn-primary">Register</a></p>
                                    <p>If you are a new customer, register now for access to product evaluations and purchasing capabilities. </p>

                                    <strong>Need access to an account?</strong><p>If your company has an existing Red Hat account, your organization administrator can grant you access.</p>

                                    <p><a href="https://access.redhat.com/support/contact/customerService/">If you have any questions, please contact customer service.</a></p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <!-- Account Authenticated -->
                        <div id="accountLinksLoggedIn" class="authenticated">
                            <h2 class="utility-header"><span id="userFirstName"></span></h2>
                            <div class="row col-border-row">
                                <div class="col-sm-6 col-border col-border-right">
                                    <div class="account-info" id="accountUser">
                                        <div class="avatar"><!-- placeholder--></div>
                                        <div class="account-name"><strong id="userFullName"></strong></div>
                                        <div class="account-org"><span id="userOrg"></span></div>

                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row account-settings">
                                        <div class="col-md-6" data-portal-tour-1="4">

                                        </div>

                                </div>

        <div class="notebook-preview">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <img class="img-responsive" src="assets/jupyterpreview.png" id="portal" alt="example notebook of Lorenz differential equations"/>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6 nb-highlight-text">
                        <h3><img src="assets/nbicon.svg" class="notebook-icon" alt="notebook icon">The Jupyter Notebook</h3>
                        <h4 class="nb-desc">The Jupyter Notebook is an open-source web application that allows you to create and share documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations and explanatory text. Uses include: data cleaning and transformation, numerical simulation, statistical modeling, machine learning and much more.</h4>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="notebook-features">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="col-md-3 notebook-feature">
                        <img class="img-responsive language" src="assets/language.svg" id="feature" alt="icon to represent a language">
                        <h4>Language of choice</h4>
                        <p>The Notebook has support for over 40 programming languages, including those popular in Data Science such as Python, R, Julia and Scala.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-3 notebook-feature">
                        <img class="img-responsive share" src="assets/share.svg" alt="icon to represent sharing a notebook">
                        <h4>Share notebooks</h4>
                        <p> Notebooks can be shared with others using email, Dropbox, GitHub and the <a href="http://nbviewer.jupyter.org/">Jupyter Notebook Viewer</a>.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-3 notebook-feature">
                        <img class="img-responsive widget" src="assets/widget.svg" alt="icon to represent an interactive widget">
                        <h4>Interactive widgets</h4>
                        <p>Code can produce rich output such as images, videos, LaTeX, and JavaScript. Interactive widgets can be used to manipulate and visualize data in realtime.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-3 notebook-feature">
                        <img class="img-responsive data" src="assets/spark.svg" alt="spark logo to represent big data">
                        <h4> Big data integration</h4>
                        <p>Leverage big data tools, such as Apache Spark, from Python, R and Scala. Explore that same data with pandas, scikit-learn, ggplot2, dplyr, etc.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
<section id="jupyterhub">
    <div class="section-grey">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="row">
            <div>
                <div class="hublogo col-md-offset-4 col-md-4 col-md-offset-4">
                    <img src="assets/hublogo.svg" class="img-responsive" style="margin:0 auto;" id="hublogo" alt="jupyterhub logo">
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-offset-3 col-md-6 col-md-offset-3" style="margin-bottom:-36px">
                    <p style="padding-top:24px; text-align: center">A multi-user version of the notebook designed for companies, classrooms and research labs</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="hubfeatures col-md-12">
                <div class="feature1 hubfeature col-md-3 authentication">
                    <img src="assets/authentication.svg" class="img-responsive" alt="authentication icon">
                    <h4>Pluggable authentication</h4>
                    <p>Manage users and authentication with PAM, OAuth or integrate with your own directory service system. Collaborate with others through the Linux permission model.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="feature-middle hubfeature col-md-3">
                    <img src="assets/central.svg" class="img-responsive" alt="icon to represent centralized deployment">
                    <h4>Centralized deployment</h4>
                    <p>Deploy the Jupyter Notebook to all of the users in your organization on centralized servers on- or off-site.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="feature-middle hubfeature col-md-3">
                    <img src="assets/container.svg" class="img-responsive" alt="container icon">
                    <h4>Container friendly</h4>
                    <p>Use Docker containers to scale your deployment and isolate user processes using a growing ecosystem of prebuilt Docker containers.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="feature4 hubfeature col-md-3">
                    <img src="assets/data.svg" class="img-responsive" id="data" alt="icon to represent data">
                    <h4>Code meets data</h4>
                    <p>Deploy the Notebook next to your data to provide unified software management and data access within your organization.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-12" style="text-align: center; margin-top: 24px;">
                <a class="orange-button" href="https://github.com/jupyter/jupyterhub">More info about JupyterHub</a>
            </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>

<section id="architecture">
    <div class="section-grey">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="architecturedescription">
                <img src="assets/architectureicon2.svg" class="section-icon" alt="icon to represent jupyter architecture">
                <h3 class="section-header">Jupyter Architecture</h3>
                <h4 class="support-paragraph">The Jupyter Notebook is based on a set of open standards for interactive computing. Think HTML and CSS for interactive computing on the web. These open standards can be leveraged by third party developers to build customized applications with embedded interactive computing.</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="architecturecontent row col-md-12">
                <div class="card col-md-4">
                    <div class="arcfeature" id="arcfeature1">
                        <div class="container">
                            <div class="front">
                                <img src="assets/notebook-format.svg" alt="icon to represent notebook format">
                                <a class="arc-button bt">Learn more</a>
                            </div>
                            <div class="front flipped content-back">
                                <h3>The Notebook Document Format</h3>
                                <p id="document">Jupyter Notebooks are an open document format based on JSON. They contain a complete record of the user's sessions and embed code, narrative text, equations and rich output. </p>
                                <a class="arc-button bt">Go back</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="card col-md-4">
                    <div class="arcfeature" id="protocol">
                        <div class="container">
                            <div class="front2">
                                <img src="assets/protocol.svg" alt="icon to represent a protocol">
                                <a class="arc-button bt1">Learn more</a>
                            </div>
                            <div class="front2 flipped content-back">
                                <h3>Interactive Computing Protocol</h3>
                                <p>The Notebook communicates with computational Kernels using the Interactive Computing Protocol, an open network protocol based on JSON data over ZMQ and WebSockets.</p>
                                <a class="arc-button bt1">Go back</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="card col-md-4">
                    <div class="arcfeature" id="kernel">
                        <div class="container">
                            <div class="front3">
                                <img src="assets/kernel.svg" alt="icon that looks like a terminal represents kernel">
                                <a class="arc-button bt2">Learn more</a>
                            </div>
                            <div class="front3 flipped content-back">
                                <h3>The Kernel</h3>
                                <p id="block3">Kernels are processes that run interactive code in a particular programming language and return output to the user. Kernels also respond to tab completion and introspection requests.</p>
                                <a class="arc-button bt2">Go back</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>

    </section>
